titles.title: Family Dairy Preservation Act of 2009
A bill to amend the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 to increase the payment rate for certain payments under the milk income loss contract program as an emergency measure.
Family Dairy Preservation Act of 2009

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: Family Dairy Preservation Act of 2009 - Amends the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 to increase milk income loss contract payments for the period March 1, 2009-November 30, 2009.
